title: 了解下申请贷款的相关事宜

conversations.english: Hello, Sir, may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 你好，先生，您需要什么服务？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I would like some information for requesting a loan.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想了解些申请贷款的信息。

title: 我想开个新的活期账户

conversations.english: good morning. How can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，有什么能帮忙的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to open a new account.

title: 你为什么不去银行开户存钱呢

conversations.english: So, Jimmy, how does it feel to have your own money?
conversations.chinese: Jimmy, 自己有钱的感觉怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: It’s great, dad. I don’t mind delivering papers, but the real fun is collecting the money.
conversations.reply_chinese: 太棒了，爸爸。送报纸倒没有什么，真正的快乐是收钱。

conversations.chinese: 小姐，我可以为你服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to open an account.

title: 我想把都市银行的账户销掉

conversations.english: The City Bank. May I help you, sir?
conversations.chinese: 都市银行。先生，我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to close my account.

conversations.english: I like to open up a savings account please.
conversations.chinese: 我想在这儿开一个储蓄帐户。
conversations.reply_english: O.K. We offer a few different kinds.
